performance.details:
2.0L Turbo-Charged, Direct Injected Engine
247 HP @ 5400 RPM and 258 b-ft Torque 1800 RPM
48V Mild Hybrid System w/ Regen Braking/13 HP ISG
8-Speed Geartronic Automatic Trans w/ Start-Stop
Dynamic Chassis Double Wishbone Front& Integral Link Rear Susp 
Anti-Lock Braking Sys (ABS) w/ Hill Start Assist 
Advanced Electronic Stability Control (ESC) 
Electric Power Assisted Steering 
18 Alloy Wheels with All-Season Tires

audio_and_technology.details:
12.3 Progressive Digital Driver Display.
with 2 display modes: Calm and Navi Mode
9 Integrated Touchscreen
4-Year Subscription to Google Automotive Services:
Feat. Google Assistant Natural Voice Recognition
Google Maps and Google Play
Inductive Smartphone Charging
Bluetooth Connectivity wl Audio Streaming
FM Radio
High Performance Audio System
USB-C Ports, 2 Front +2 Rear

safety_and_security.details:
LED Headlights with DRL, AHB and ABL
Blind Spot Information System with Steer Assist
and Cross Traffic Alert with Autobrake
Collision Avoidance featuring:
Low&High Speed Collision Mitigation
Detects Vehicle/Pedestrian/Cyclist/Large Animal
Driver Alert Control
Run-off Road Protection& Run-off Road Mitigation
Lane Departure Warning/Lane Keeping Aid
Oncoming Mitigation by Braking
Front, Side & Curtain Airbags
with Driver Side Knee Airbag
Whiplash Protection System (WHIPS) in Front Seats
Connected Safety: Slippery Road/Hazard Light Alert
Rear Park Assist Camera + Rear Park Assist
Child Lock, Rear Doors
Automatic Braking after Collision
Automatic Unlocking after Collision

luxury_and_convenience.details:
Laminated Panoramic Moonroof w/ Power Sunshade
City Weave Textile Seating Surfaces
Tilt& Telescopic Steering Wheel
Keyless Entry& Drive w/ lluminated Door Handles
Integrated Roof Rails
Front Grille, High Gloss Black
Bright Window Surround
Power Front Seats w/ Driver Seat Memory
Includ. Power Lumbar Support
2-Zone Automatic Climate Control+CleanZone
Auto Dimming Interior & Exterior Mirrors
Retractable Side View Mirrors
Tinted Windows, Rear Side Doors and Cargo
Wiper Blades with Integrated Washers
Tempa Spare Wheel incl. Jack Kit
Body Colored Rear Insert
luminated Vanity Mirror in Sunvisors
